overview: Daniel lives in Bernau, a small town north of Berlin.This film tells this 21-year-oldâ€™s story and describes the radical right-wing milieu in which he grew up. In his candid portrait of how right-wing radicalism breeds, Daniel explains how difficult it is to break out of a vicious circle of violence, self-hatred and a right-wing extremist frame of mind.
title: Think German!
